t_scene_info.speaker: Kiyomi:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I'm starting to cry because you made me ugly...

t_scene_info.speaker: Sanae:
t_scene_info.dialogue: What a way to end up. All the women are now an ugly mess. When will this end?

t_scene_info.speaker: Kiyomi:
t_scene_info.dialogue: My answer will be inferior, but there is hope for you.

t_scene_info.speaker: Kiyomi:
t_scene_info.dialogue: It may have started in a tower near the Youkai Mountain range.

t_scene_info.speaker: Sanae:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I spent way too much time going here. I have faith in success.
